original_text: Who will rise up for me against the evildoers? or who will stand up for me against the workers of iniquity?
korean_text: 누가 나를 위하여 일어나서 행악자들을 치며 누가 나를 위하여 일어나서 악행하는 자들을 칠까

sentences.original_text: Who will rise up for me against the evildoers?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 나를 위해 악인들에게 맞서 일어설 것인가?

sentences.original_text: or who will stand up for me
sentences.korean_translation: 또 누가 나를 위해 서줄 것인가?
